09-26-2024: - Fixed a bug where {{HeroIcon|Hero=Kelvin|Size=20}} Kelvin desperation VO for {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path were flipped
- Bullet damage growth reduced from 1.2 to 0.9
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam movement slow reduced from 70% to 50%
- Moving through breakables while on {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path now destroys them
09-12-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam fire rate slow reduced from 80% to 40%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam movement slow reduced from 80% to 70%
- Objectives and Rejuvenator are now frozen and invulnerable when under frozen shelter
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam can now also be cancelled by hitting the ability key again
08-29-2024: - Base health growth per boon increased from +45 to +50
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam max slow increased from 60% to 80%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam now affects soul orbs (secures/denies them)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam T3 range reduced from 15m to 13m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade T2 Heal increased from 135 to 145
08-15-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam no longer applies a Disarm
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam now slows {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate (same values as slow)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam max slow reduced from 90% to 60%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam time to reach max slow increased from 1.2s to 2s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter can now be cast while using {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam
08-01-2024: - Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shoulder Charge|Size=20}} Shoulder Charge not stunning the target when colliding with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Kelvin|Size=20}} Kelvin's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Dome|Size=20}} Ice Dome
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam not having proper lag compensation
- Fixed some cases where {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade would explode and not hit anyone
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam can now be canceled directly by using parry
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade cast time reduced from 0.2s to 0.1s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade recharge time reduced from 8s to 7s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path sprint is now granted immediately on use
07-18-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade cooldown reduced from 23s to 21s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path trail duration increased from 15s to 18s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam T3 now hits up to 2 additional targets
06-27-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam spirit scaling increased from 0.7 to 0.9
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam cooldown reduced from 25 to 23
06-20-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam movespeed limit is now applied via a reduction rather than a speed cap (to allow items to be combined for faster movement like {{ItemIcon|Item=Surge of Power|Size=20}} Surge of Power)
06-13-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter movement speed slow increased from 25% to 35%
- Can now dismiss {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter while channeling other abilities ({{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam)
06-06-2024: - Improved visuals for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Kelvin|Size=20}} Kelvin's gun projectile
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path sprint speed increased from +1 to +2
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path trail duration increased from 12s to 15s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter T2 changed to -40s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter T3 changed to +70 {{ItemIcon|Item=Health Regen|Size=20}} Health Regen that scales with Spirit
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter can now be dismissed early
05-30-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade radius increased from 6 to 6.5
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade charge time reduced from 10s to 8s
- Players can now slide down the {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path slow resistance increased from 50% to 60%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path T3 max spirit increased from 40 to 55
05-23-2024: - Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Kelvin|Size=20}} Kelvin’s Ice Beam sometimes not hitting Neutrals
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade cooldown reduced from 26s to 23s
- While {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Pathing you no longer slow down when you shoot your gun
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam Channel move speed increased from 4 to 6
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam T1 changed from "+2 Channel Move Speed" to -8s Cooldown
05-16-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frozen Shelter|Size=20}} Frozen Shelter T1 increased from +35% to +40% {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate Slow
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path T3 Now gains 1 Spirit per meter of {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Path trail created. Max of 40 Spirit.
05-10-2024: - Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Dome|Size=20}} Ice Dome effects disappearing while still active if {{HeroIcon|Hero=Kelvin|Size=20}} Kelvin dies during it
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade cooldown reduced from 30s to 26s
05-03-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade T3 bonus damage increased from +100 to +175
